question: Who are the top performing salespeople by total revenue generated?
query: SELECT TOP 10 p.PersonID, p.FullName, COUNT(DISTINCT i.InvoiceID) AS TotalInvoices, SUM(il.ExtendedPrice) AS TotalRevenue FROM Application.People p JOIN Sales.Invoices i ON p.PersonID = i.SalespersonPersonID JOIN Sales.InvoiceLines il ON i.InvoiceID = il.InvoiceID WHERE p.IsSalesperson = 1 GROUP BY p.PersonID, p.FullName ORDER BY TotalRevenue DESC
reasoning: This query joins People with Invoices and InvoiceLines to calculate revenue generated by each salesperson. It filters to only salespeople and orders by total revenue to find top performers.
